articles.title: 3rd Session of 12th SPA Held
articles.content:
3rd Session of 12th SPA Held 
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The Third Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.
					 Deputies to the SPA participated in the session.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, took the platform.
					
					 Chairman Choe Thae Bok made an opening address.
					
					 Discussed at the session were agenda items on recall and election of premier of the DPRK Cabinet and organizational matters.
					
					 Deputy Kim Yong Il was recalled from the post of premier and Deputy Choe Yong Rim was elected to the post at the proposal of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee at the end of the discussion on the first agenda item.
					
					 Then followed discussion on the second agenda item.
					
					 Deputy Jang Song Thaek was elected as vice-chairman of the NDC at the proposal of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Some Cabinet members were recalled and appointed at the session.
					
					 Deputies Kwak Pom Gi, O Su Yong and Pak Myong Son were recalled from the post of vice-premier while Deputy Ri Ju O from the post of minister of Light Industry, Deputy Jong Yon Gwa from the post of minister of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry and Deputy Pak Hak Son from that of chairman of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission. 
					
					 Deputies Kang Nung Su, Kim Rak Hui, Ri Thae Nam and Jon Ha Chol were appointed as vice-premiers, Deputy Jo Pyong Ju as vice-premier and concurrently minister of Machine-Building Industry, Deputy Han Kwang Bok as vice-premier and concurrently minister of Electronics Industry, Deputy An Jong Su as minister of Light Industry, Deputy Jo Yong Chol as minister of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry and Deputy Pak Myong Chol as minister of Physical Culture and Sports. 
					
					 Deputy Choe Yong Rim was sworn in as premier at the session.

articles.title: Jang Song Thaek Elected NDC Vice-Chairman
articles.content:
Jang Song Thaek Elected NDC Vice-Chairman
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Jang Song Thaek was elected vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK at the 3rd Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly.
					 Born on Jan. 22, Juche 35 (1946), he graduated from Kim Il Sung University and worked as an instructor of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. And he had been active as instructor, deputy section chief, section chief, vice department director, first vice department director and department director of the WPK Central Committee since 1972.
					
					 He has worked as director of the Administration Department of the C.C., the WPK since 2007.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Elected PM
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Elected PM
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Choe Yong Rim was elected premier of the Cabinet at the 3rd Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					 Born on November 20, Juche 19 (1930), Choe served in the Korean People's Army. He got the qualifications as an economic engineer after graduating from a university. 
					
					 He worked as instructor, section chief, vice department director, first vice department director and department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chief secretary of the Secretaries Office of the Kumsusan Assembly Hall. Then he held posts of vice premier of the Administration Council, director of the Central Public Prosecutors Office and secretary general of the SPA Presidium. 
					
					 He has worked as chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK up to now since 2009.

articles.title: Kang Nung Su Appointed as Vice-PM
articles.content:
Kang Nung Su Appointed as Vice-PM
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Kang Nung Su was appointed as vice-premier of the Cabinet at the 3rd Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					 Born on February 21, Juche 19 (1930), Kang served in the Korean People's Army. Then he graduated from Kim Il Sung University and won the qualifications for expert of the Korean literature.
					
					 He had worked as instructor of the C.C., the Writers Union of Korea, chief of the Room for Creative Work of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, vice-chairman of the C.C., the WUK, head of the April 15 Literary Production Company, chairman of the Kimilsungia- Kimjongilia Committee of the DPRK and minister of Culture.
					
					 He has been active as director of the Film Department of the WPK Central Committee and concurrently chairman of the State Film Commission up to now, starting this year.

articles.title: Ri Thae Nam Appointed as Vice-PM
articles.content:
Ri Thae Nam Appointed as Vice-PM
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Ri Thae Nam was appointed as vice-premier of the Cabinet at the 3rd Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					 Ri, born on June 25, Juche 27 (1938), graduated from Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering and got the qualifications for metal processing engineer.
					
					 He took the post of a workshop head of the Ranam Coal Mining Machine Plant, instructor, deputy section chief and section chief of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, chief party secretary of the Kangson Steel Complex, chairman of the Nampho City Administrative and Economic Committee, chief party secretary of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex, chief secretary of a provincial committee of the WPK and chief party secretary of the Sungri Motor Complex.
					
					 He has worked as chief secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK since 2009.

articles.title: Kim Rak Hui Appointed as Vice-PM
articles.content:
Kim Rak Hui Appointed as Vice-PM
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Rak Hui was appointed as vice premier of the Cabinet at the 3rd Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					 Kim was born on November 11, Juche 22 (1933). 
					
					 Graduated from the University of National Economics, she worked as management board chairperson of a cooperative farm, chairperson of a county cooperative farm management committee, chairperson of a provincial rural economy committee and vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 She has worked as chief secretary of the South Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK up to now since 2005.

articles.title: Jon Ha Chol Appointed as Vice-PM
articles.content:
Jon Ha Chol Appointed as Vice-PM
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Jon Ha Chol was appointed as vice-premier of the Cabinet at the 3rd Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					 He was born on April 22, Juche 17 (1928) and got the qualification as a geological expert on physical prospecting after graduating from a university.
					
					 He worked as researcher and room chief of the Academy of Sciences, section chief of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, director of the General Bureau of Geology, minister of Mining Industry, chief councilor of the Administration Council, economic secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, chairman of the Provincial Economic Guidance Committee, department director of the WPK Central Committee and chief secretary of the Secretaries Office of the Kumsusan Assembly Hall. 
					
					 He has worked as vice director of the Planning and Financial Department of the WPK Central Committee up to now since 2006.

articles.title: Jo Pyong Ju Appointed as Vice-PM and MMBI
articles.content:
Jo Pyong Ju Appointed as Vice-PM and MMBI
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Jo Pyong Ju was appointed as vice-premier of the Cabinet and concurrently minister of Machine-Building Industry at the 3rd Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					 He was born on December 1, Juche 31 (1942). He got qualification as a machine-building engineer after graduating from Ryongsong University of Mechanical Engineering.
					
					 He worked as instructor and shop head of the Ryongsong Machine Plant, manager of the Hamhung Compressor Plant, director general of the Ryongsong Associated Machinery Bureau and manager of the Ryongsong Machine Complex.
					
					 He has worked as minister of Machine-Building Industry up to now since 2005.

articles.title: Han Kwang Bok Appointed as Vice-PM and MEI
articles.content:
Han Kwang Bok Appointed as Vice-PM and MEI
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Han Kwang Bok was appointed as vice-premier of the Cabinet and concurrently minister of Electronics Industry at the 3rd Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					 She was born on March 18, Juche 35 (1946). She got qualifications as an electronics engineer after graduating from Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					
					 She worked as instructor and chief instructor of the Metal and Machine-Building Industries Commission and vice-minister of Machine-Building Industry.
					
					 She has worked as minister of Electronics Industry up to now since 2009.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Statue of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Statue of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar laid a floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before his statue, carrying with them profound reverence for him, and paid tribute to him.

articles.title: Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar Opens
articles.content:
Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar Opens
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar was opened at Yanggakdo International Hotel on Monday.
					 At the seminar to be held on the theme of "Maritime insurance and reinsurance to cope with the present market situation" insurance experts inside and outside the DPRK and personages will present papers on the pending insurance issues and hold discussions on them.
					
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Pak Su Gil, vice-premier and minister of Finance, So Tong Myong, general manager of the Korean National General Insurance Company who is chairman of the Organizing Committee of the Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar, and officials of the company, insurance workers in local areas and officials concerned.
					
					 Among those present were Ezzat Abdel-Bary, secretary general of the Federation of Afro-Asian Insurers and Reinsurers, and his party, Roberto Quinto Martinez, permanent secretariat of the Association of Insurance and Reinsurance in Developing Countries, and representatives of companies of China, Morocco, Sudan, Switzerland, the United Arab Emirates, Britain, India and Egypt, officials of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here and the delegation of the Kumgang Insurance Company of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 So Tong Myong said in his opening speech that the seminar would help to find practical ways for meeting the challenges to the maritime insurance and reinsurance markets.
					
					 Expressing belief that the seminar would make successful progress thanks to the sincere and positive efforts of the participants, he declared the seminar open. 
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop in his congratulating speech said that the international environment at present requires each country to make an effective use of its financial resources in the field of insurance and boost the cooperation and exchange among countries.
					
					 He expressed belief that the seminar would yield good results and, furthermore, prove to be an assembly conducive to more energetically developing the maritime insurance worldwide. 
					
					 Ezzat Abdel-Bary in his speech expressed thanks to the government and people of the DPRK for having invariably supported the cooperation between the two continents of Asia and Africa and contributed to the development of the federation.
					
					 He expressed hope that the insurance officials would achieve great successes in their work by their concerted efforts.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 On the same day the Seminar Organizing Committee and the Korean National General Insurance Company hosted a reception at the Okryu Restaurant in honor of the participants in the seminar.

articles.title: World Environment Day Observed
articles.content:
World Environment Day Observed
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the Grand People's Study House on Monday on the occasion of World Environment Day.
					 Present there were officials of ministries and national institutions including the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation, the visiting delegation of the United Nations Environment Programme, members of the delegation of Tongji University in Shanghai of China, representatives of international organizations and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Kim Song Hak, vice-minister of Land and Environmental Conservation, and Henk Verbeek, head of the delegation of the United Nations Environment Programme, spoke at the meeting. 
					
					 Speakers said that to observe the day is of weighty significance, recalling that the United Nations Environment Programme proposed setting "many biological species, a planet and future" as the theme of this year. 
					
					 They stressed the need to make joint efforts to protect bio-diversity and raise its social awareness. 
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The speakers referred to the cause for depleting the bio-diversity and ways of settling the problem, closer international cooperation in protecting it and the achievements made by the DPRK.

articles.title: Workshop for FIFA Referees Held
articles.content:
Workshop for FIFA Referees Held
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- A workshop for FIFA referees was held from June 1 to 6 at Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang.
					 The workshop, divided into theoretical and practical courses, was attended by international and national referees of Korea, football coaches from different sports teams and teachers of juvenile sports schools in the country.
					
					  It deals with the match rules, referee's role and signals in match, warming-up exercise method, training of persevering in fast running, etc.  
					
					 The courses were given by Mohamad Rodzali bin Yacob and Ahmad Khalidi Supian, lecturers of FIFA.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Shanghai International Culture Association and the China Welfare Institute Children's Palace.
					 It was handed to the head of the delegation of the DPRK schoolchildren on May 25. The delegation participated in the calligraphy and picture exhibition of the children of the two countries.

articles.title: Stone Paper Processing Technology Developed
articles.content:
Stone Paper Processing Technology Developed
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Researchers of Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry have developed a technology of making stone paper with plastic and limestone.
					 By this technology, stone paper is manufactured without use of wood and water.
					
					 It, which can keep its color unchanged for a long time, is much stronger than ordinary pulp paper in dynamic intensity and has various advantages, including remanufacture.
					
					 It can be used in producing vellum, inflammables, single-use food container, etc.
					
					 Little affected by climate, it is a good material of billboard.
					
					 The university is buckling down to introducing the technology in production.

articles.title: Warmongers' Projected Adventurous Nuclear War Maneuvers Slammed
articles.content:
Warmongers' Projected Adventurous Nuclear War Maneuvers Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The United States and the south Korean warmongers are contemplating staging the largest-ever combined anti-submarine exercises in the waters of the West Sea despite repeated warnings of the DPRK. This can never be overlooked as they will be exercises for an extremely adventurous nuclear war presupposing preemptive attacks and the exercise of the right to high-handed military actions against the DPRK. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a signed commentary:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are mulling staging provocative war exercises by mobilizing huge mobile task forces to put a military pressure upon the DPRK and, at the same time, launch an actual war for invading it any moment.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces assert that the projected war maneuvers are of "defensive nature" and "a demonstration of armed forces" in a bid to hide their offensive nature and their objective for aggression, but they can never cover up their dangerous and grave nature. 
					
					 The Obama Administration seeks to ignite another Korean war while escalating the confrontation with the DPRK under the pretext of the conspiratorial case of warship sinking. 
					
					  It is the scenario of the U.S. imperialists to stage the above-said maneuvers with the calculation that nothing will happen if they put their plan for military actions against the DPRK into practice on the assumption that their persistent anti-DPRK false propaganda succeeded in building international opinion that the DPRK is a "suspect."
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces dare ignite a war, misjudging the strong mental power and will of the army and the people of the DPRK, they will sternly punish the war provocateurs with a merciless retaliation, warns the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korea Can Never Evade Responsibility for Hideous Crime
articles.content:
- S. Korea Can Never Evade Responsibility for Hideous Crime
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group is now making desperate efforts to escape the public criticism of it mounting as the truth about the case of warship sinking orchestrated by it is now being gradually brought to light in the eyes of the world, but it can never evade the responsibility for this hideous crime. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It says: 
					
					 Some days ago, the puppet military dared dismiss as "a false claim" the statement made at the press conference held by the DPRK National Defence Commission giving with perfect logic the lie to the assertion that "its warship was sunken by a torpedo attack from the north". And they also let loose a whole string of jargons that "it is possible for an underwater boat to carry a heavy torpedo" and a torpedo is also marked in the same style as in the north. They went the lengths of letting loose a tirade about "the impartiality of the investigation" into the case. 
					
					  The puppet military group should have already been punished for the above-said case but it is persisting in its charade designed to groundlessly lay the blame for the case at the DPRK's door, lost to all sense of decency. This suggests that the puppet warmongers' behavior was prompted by their guilty conscience. 
					
					 The public in south Korea and other parts of the world is now becoming more vocal than ever before asserting that the above-said case was jointly orchestrated by the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to achieve their sinister aims and demanding an overall reinvestigation into the case. 
					
					 This being a hard reality, the puppet group is resorting to a cynical ploy to justify its assertion in a bid to mislead public opinion. This is nothing but a far-fetched assertion to cover up the truth about its anti-DPRK farce come what may and push the confrontation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war without fail. 
					
					 The puppet authorities are sadly mistaken if they calculate their poor charade will help escape the mounting criticism and condemnation of the public at home and abroad, observes the commentary.

articles.title: Authorities' Fascist Repression Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Authorities' Fascist Repression Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) made public a statement on June 3 denouncing the puppet security authorities for the fascist crackdown upon the organization.
					 The statement noted that the "Security Investigation Group" in Seoul summoned the chairman of the organization that day and the "Security Investigation Group" of the Pusan Police Agency issued summons several times starting on May 20 for the chief editor of the organ of the said headquarters under the pretext of investigation into the rally marking the 19th anniversary of the formation of Pomminryon.
					
					 Such actions make people laugh as they were conducted as extension part of the scheme to intensify the anti-DPRK offensive on a full scale by cooking up the case of warship sinking with a delusion about "victory of the Grand National Party in the elections to local self-governing bodies", it pointed out.
					
					 The sycophantic traitors, who regard it as normal to act a slave of the U.S., are trying to suppress the people with violence but it is futile attempt, it said.
					
					 Any fascist violence can never block the road ahead of Pomminryon, the statement said, urging the Lee Myung Bak dictatorial forces to stop at once the suppression under the pretext of security.

articles.title: Chongryon Denounces S. Korea's Confrontation Policy
articles.content:
Chongryon Denounces S. Korea's Confrontation Policy
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Chairmen of prefectural headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on June 3 in denunciation of the south Korean puppet group of traitors' anachronistic policy for confrontation with the DPRK.
					 Ha Jong Bong, chairman of the Aichi Prefectural Headquarters, deplored in his statement that the south Korean group of traitors is now getting frantic in confrontation with the DPRK, groundlessly linking the sinking case of warship "Cheonan" with it, under the patronage of the U.S.
					
					 Any desperate attempt of traitor Lee Myung Bak can never check the nationwide struggle of all the fellow countrymen to open up the new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity by pooling their efforts under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, he stressed.
					
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Ibaraki Prefectural Headquarters, contended that Lee Myung Bak should be branded as an architect of the sinking case because he has persistently refused to receive an inspection group of the DPRK which is able to probe the truth behind the case.
					
					 Kim Jin Ho, chairman of the Hiroshima Prefectural Headquarters, expressed conviction that the truth behind the recent anti-DPRK plot would be surely brought to light as the past cases were done.
					
					 Ri Ju Hak, chairman of the Fukuoka Prefectural Headquarters, held that traitor Lee should immediately stop the anti-DPRK confrontation farce, in which his group has asserted that it would not rule out a war against the DPRK after burying innocent seamen in waters to meet their sinister political desire.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Campaign of US and S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Campaign of US and S. Korea under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Italian and German political figures bitterly denounced the anti-DPRK smear campaign of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities.
					 Mauro Cazadio, general secretary of the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy, in his statement on June 1 said that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are crying out for "sanctions" and "retaliation" against the DPRK under the pretext of the case of "Cheonan's" sinking and, at the same time, escalating the provocative aggression moves to stifle Korean-style socialism.
					
					 But they can never dampen the will of the Korean people to build an economic power and achieve independent and peaceful reunification of the country, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The Korean people will surely emerge victorious in the acute stand-off with the U.S. and all other hostile forces.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should stop at once the moves for provoking a new war against the DPRK.
					
					 Wolfgang Fittinger, chairman of the Brandenburg State Committee of the Communist Party of Germany, in his statement on June 2 accused the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of getting evermore frantic in the anti-DPRK moves, deliberately linking the case of warship "Cheonan's" sinking with the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should immediately stop the dangerous moves aggravating the situation on the Korean Peninsula, he urged, extending full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their efforts for justice. 
					
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, also made public a statement on June 2 on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. In the statement he noted that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors totally denied the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration and persistently stood in the way of their implementation.  He took note of recent development in which they cooked up a sheer fabrication that "Cheonan" was sunken by "torpedo attack" of the DPRK, misleading the domestic and foreign public opinion.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Supported
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Kamal Hyder, secretary general of the Bangladesh Peace Council, made public a statement on June 2 on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					 In a statement he noted that the publication of the June 15 joint declaration was a historic event which brought about an epochal turn in the reunification movement of the Korean nation.
					
					 The joint declaration serves as a cornerstone for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and a great programme for reunification of Korea as it clarifies the fundamental principles and practical ways for national reconciliation, unity and reunification, he said, and went on: 
					
					 The idea of "By our nation itself", basic spirit of the joint declaration, calls on the north and the south of Korea to solve the issue of reunification free from outsiders' interference. 
					
					 The adoption of the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, opened up a brighter prospect for the reunification movement of the Korean nation. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il would surely achieve independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded in Egypt
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded in Egypt
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- The Egypt-Korea Friendship Association on June 1 issued bulletin titled "Kim Jong Il, Ever-victorious Statesman of Ability" on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The bulletin in an article said:
					
					June 19 is the anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 During the past 46 years since that day in 1964 he proved himself to be a peerless statesman who wins victories only by dint of his outstanding political ability.
					
					 Kim Jong Il victoriously leads the revolution, construction and socialism with his extraordinary organizing and mobilizing ability, unyielding practical capability, inexhaustible creative power, confidence in sure victory, iron will and matchless courage and pluck.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Early on the morning of April 15, Juche 43 (1954), President Kim Il Sung left for Samjong-ri of Junghwa County, South Phyongan Province (then).
					 During his field guidance over the ri, the President learned that there was a spring in its vicinity and turned his steps toward it.
					
					 The officials of the rural community told him the spring was in muddy land. But the President did not hesitate to go to it, saying that he had covered rugged paths during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Arriving at the spot, he advised the officials to use the spring water for fish breeding and fully supply fish to the people of the ri.
					
					 That day was his birthday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Granja Fruticola Combinada Taedonggang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Granja Fruticola Combinada Taedonggang
Pyongyang, 7 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la ampliada Granja Fruticola Combinada Taedonggang.
					El Dirigente fue acogido en el terreno por Ju Sang Song, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo, Ri Pyong Sam, jefe de la Direccion Politica del Ejercito del Interior Popular de Corea, y otros miembros del mando del Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo asi como los funcionarios directivos de la granja.
					
					Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el plano, recorrio largo tiempo varios lugares de la granja y se informo en detalles de la ampliacion de la capacidad.
					
					Es un gran exito que los constructores militares han terminado en unos meses la magna obra para quintuplicar el tamano original de la granja resistiendo el tremendo frio, senalo y evaluo de altos sus meritos. 
					
					Al recorrer varios lugares de la huerta, dijo que esta granja construida en el maximo nivel da otro paisaje maravilloso que representa la epoca del Songun y se alegro mucho de poder llevar a la realidad el deseo del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien se preocupaba toda su vida por suministrar mucho mas frutas al pueblo coreano. 
					
					La construccion de la granja fruticola de gran dimension como la Taedonggang es una gran obra que puede ser cumplida solo en el regimen socialista de nuestro pais que vive del colectivismo, afirmo y apunto orgulloso que es muy grandioso el poderio espiritual de nuestro ejercito y pueblo unidos monoliticamente en torno al partido y al lider. 
					
					La granja fruticola Taedonggang es una gran creacion a la altura del nuevo siglo, destaco y agrego que la patria se transforma de dia en dia en el fragor del gran auge que sacude todo el pais y este cambio esplendido anuncia el futuro maravilloso de la gran potencia prospera que se hara realidad en un futuro cercano. 
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente recorrio el deposito de frutas dotado de instalaciones ultramodernas y la moderna fabrica de la manzana secada, donde forman una cadena de produccion automatica todos los procesos desde el lavado y el corte hasta el secado y el embalaje, y se mostro muy satisfecho de estas magnificas construcciones que satisfacen los requisitos de la era de la economia basada en la intelectualidad. 
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan ante la granja diciendo que ella es la ejemplar que tiene gran importancia no solo en suministrar las frutas a los habitantes sino tambien en modernizar la fruticultura del pais. 
					
					El desarrollo de la fruticultura es un trabajo digno para glorificar las imborrables proezas del Presidente quien vivio su vida dedicando todo lo suyo al mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo y para llevar a la realidad su ideario Iminwichon (considerar al pueblo como el cielo), recalco. 
					
					Para suministrar a los habitantes las frutas producidas aqui sin perder ninguna, hay que recoger en el tiempo adecuado las manzanas mediante la distribucion correcta de la mano de obra, prestar profunda atencion a la conservacion y mejorar incesantemente el procesamiento de frutas, indico.
					
					Se fotografio junto a los constructores militares volviendo a apreciar la enorme contribucion de ellos a la sagrada lucha por la prosperidad de la patria. 
					
					Le acompanaron en esta visita de orientacion los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, y el primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Sesionado tercer periodo de sesiones de XII legislatura de la APS
articles.content:
Sesionado tercer periodo de sesiones de XII legislatura de la APS
Pyongyang, 7 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae el tercer periodo de sesiones de la XII legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con la participacion de los diputados a la APS. 
					Estuvo presente en la ocasion el Dirigente       Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC.
					
					La palabra inaugural estuvo a cargo del presidente de la APS Choe Thae Bok.
					
					Se pusieron a debate los puntos de la agenda sobre la destitucion del premier y la eleccion del nuevo premier y los problemas de organizacion.
					
					Como primer punto de la agenda, a propuesta del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el diputado Kim Yong Il fue revocado del premier del Consejo de Ministros y el diputado Choe Yong Rim fue elegido como primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros.
					
					En la reunion fue discutido el segundo punto de la agenda. 
					
					A propuesta del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el diputado Jang Song Thaek fue electo como vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional.
					
					El diputado Choe Yong Rim propuso la remocion y el nombramiento de algunos miembros del Consejo de Ministros. 
					
					Segun ello, los diputados Kwak Pom Gi, O Su Yong y Pak Myong Son fueron removidos del cargo de vicepremier; el diputado Ri Ju O, del de ministro de Industria Ligera; el diputado Jong Yon Gwa, del de ministro de Industria Alimentaria y de Necesidades Diarias; y el diputado Pak Hak Son, del de presidente del Comite de Direccion de Deportes.
					
					Los diputados Kang Nung Su, Kim Rak Hui, Ri Thae Nam y Jon Ha Chol fueron nombrados como vicepremieres; el diputado Jo Pyong Ju como vicepremier y ministro de Industria Mecanica; el diputado Han Kwang Bok como vicepremier y ministro de Industria Electronica; el diputado An Jong Su como ministro de Industria Ligera; el diputado Jo Yong Chol como ministro de Industria Alimentaria y de Necesidades Diarias; el diputado Pak Myong Chol como ministro de Deportes. 
					
					El nuevo premier Choe Yong Rim presto el juramento.

articles.title: Elegido Jang Song Thaek como vicepresidente del CDN
articles.content:
Elegido Jang Song Thaek como vicepresidente del CDN
Pyongyang, 7 de junio (ATCC) -- En el tercer periodo de sesiones de la XII legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jang Song Thaek fue electo como vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional.
					El nacio el 22 de enero del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche.
					
					  Despues de graduarse de la Universidad           Kim Il Sung, trabajo de funcionario del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang y desde 1972, como funcionario, subjefe y jefe de seccion, subjefe, primer subjefe y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC.
					
					  Desde el 96 (2007) de la Era Juche, trabaja de jefe del Departamento de Administracion del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Elegido Choe Yong Rim como primer ministro
articles.content:
Elegido Choe Yong Rim como primer ministro
Pyongyang, 7 de junio (ATCC) -- Choe Yong Rim fue elegido como primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el tercer periodo de sesiones de la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema (APS).
					Nacio el 20 de noviembre del 19 (1930) de la Era Juche y se alisto en 1950 en el Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Al terminar su carrera universitaria luego de ser desmovilizado, recibio el titulo de ingeniero de economia.
					
					Trabajo de funcionario, jefe de seccion, subjefe, primer subjefe y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, secretario en jefe de la Oficina de Secretarios del Palacio de los Congresos Kumsusan, viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Administracion, presidente de la Fiscalia Central, secretario del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema.
					
					Desde 2009 hasta la fecha, trabajo como secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang.

articles.title: Nombrado Kang Nung Su como vicepremier
articles.content:
Nombrado Kang Nung Su como vicepremier
Pyongyang, 7 de junio (ATCC) -- En el tercer periodo de sesiones de la XII legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kang Nung Su fue nombrado como viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros.
					Nacio el 21 de febrero del 19 (1930) de la Era Juche, sirvio en el Ejercito Popular de Corea y recibio la licenciatura en la literatura coreana al graduarse de la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					
					Trabajo de funcionario del Comite Central de la Union de Escritores de Corea (UEC), jefe de la seccion de Creacion del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del CC de la UEC, director del Colectivo de Creacion Literaria 15 de Abril, presidente del Comite Coreano de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia y de ministro de Cultura.
					
					Desde principios del 99 (2010) de la Era Juche hasta la fecha, trabajo de jefe del Departamento de Cine del CC del PTC y presidente del Comite Estatal de Cine.

articles.title: Nombrado Ri Thae Nam como vicepremier
articles.content:
Nombrado Ri Thae Nam como vicepremier
Pyongyang, 7 de junio (ATCC) -- En el tercer periodo de sesiones de la XII legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Thae Nam fue nombrado como viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros.
					El nacio el 25 de junio del 27 (1938) de la Era Juche.
					
					  Despues de graduarse de la Universidad de Maquinaria de Pyongyang, recibio el titulo de ingeniero de la elaboracion de metales.
					
					  Trabajo de jefe de taller de la Fabrica de Maquinas de Minas de Carbon de Ranam, funcionario, subjefe y jefe de seccion del CC del PTC, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en el Complejo de Acero de Kangson, presidente del Comite de Administracion y Economia de la Ciudad de Nampho, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en el Complejo Siderurgico Hwanghae, secretario responsable del PTC en la provincia y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en el Complejo de Camiones Sungri.
					
					  Fungio como secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Sur desde el 98 (2009) de la Era Juche hasta la fecha.

articles.title: Nombrada Kim Rak Hui como vicepremier
articles.content:
Nombrada Kim Rak Hui como vicepremier 
  Pyongyang, 7 de junio (ATCC) -- En el tercer periodo de sesiones de la XII legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Rak Hui fue designada como vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros.
					Ella nacio el 11 de noviembre del 22 (1933) de la Era Juche.
					
					 Luego de graduarse de la Universidad de Economia Nacional, trabajo de presidenta de la Junta Administrativa de Granja Cooperativa, del Comite de Gestion de Granjas Cooperativas del Distrito y del Comite de Economia Rural de la Provincia y de subjefa de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					 Fungio como secretaria responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hwanghae del Sur desde el 94 (2005) de la Era Juche hasta la fecha.

articles.title: Designado Jon Ha Chol como vicepremier
articles.content:
Designado Jon Ha Chol como vicepremier
Pyongyang, 7 de junio (ATCC) -- En el tercer periodo de sesiones de la XII legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jon Ha Chol fue nombrado como vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros.
					Nacio el 22 de abril del 17 (1928) de la Era Juche.
					
					  Al terminar su carrera universitaria, se hizo licenciado en la prospeccion geofisica.
					
					  Trabajo de investigador y jefe de seccion de la Academia de Ciencias, jefe de seccion del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, titular de la Direccion General de Geologia, ministro de Mineria, consejero responsable del Consejo de Administracion, secretario de economia del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, presidente del Comite de Direccion Economica de la provincia, jefe de departamento del CC del PTC y secretario en jefe de la Oficina de Secretarios del Palacio de los Congresos Kumsusan.
					
					  Desde el 95 (2006) de la Era Juche hasta la fecha, trabajo de subjefe de departamento de planificacion y finanzas del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Nombrado Jo Pyong Ju como vicepremier y ministro
articles.content:
Nombrado Jo Pyong Ju como vicepremier y ministro
Pyongyang, 7 de junio (ATCC) -- En el tercer periodo de sesiones de la XII legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jo Pyong Ju fue designado como viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros y ministro de Industria Mecanica.
					  Nacio el dia primero de diciembre del 31 (1942) de la Era Juche.
					
					  Al graduarse de la Universidad de la Maquinaria de Ryongsong, recibio el titulo de ingeniero de la maquinaria.
					
					  Trabajo de funcionario y jefe de taller de la Fabrica Mecanica de Ryongsong, gerente de la Fabrica de Compresores de Hamhung, titular de la Direccion Combinada de Maquinaria de Ryongsong y gerente del Complejo de Maquinaria de Ryongsong.
					
					  Trabajo de ministro de Industria Mecanica desde el 94 (2005) de la Era Juche hasta la fecha.

articles.title: Nombrado Han Kwang Bok como vicepremier y ministro de Electronica
articles.content:
Nombrado Han Kwang Bok como vicepremier y ministro de Electronica
 Pyongyang, 7 de junio (ATCC) -- En el tercer periodo de sesiones de la XII legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Han Kwang Bok fue designado como vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros y ministro de Industria Electronica.
					 El nacio el 18 de marzo del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche.
					
					  Al graduarse de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, recibio el titulo de ingeniero de la electronica.
					
					  Trabajo de funcionario y funcionario en jefe del Comite de Industria Metalurgica y Mecanica y viceministro de Industria Mecanica.
					
					  Laboro como ministro de Industria Electronica desde el 98 (2009) de la Era Juche hasta la fecha.
